com.joliciel.talismane.utils

Interface PersistentList<E>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.Collection<E>, java.lang.Iterable<E>, java.util.List<E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersistentListImpl

    public interface PersistentList<E>
extends java.util.List<E>
    A List representing dependent objects stored in the database.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addAllFromDB(java.util.Collection<? extends E> c)
      Add a whole collection at a time.
      boolean addFromDB(E element)
      To be used whenever populating the list initially from the database.
      java.util.List<E> getItemsAdded()
      Which items have been added that need to be persisted.
      java.util.List<E> getItemsRemoved()
      Which items have been removed that need to be persisted.
      boolean isDirty()
      Have items been added or removed from this list?

    • Method Detail

      • addFromDB

        boolean addFromDB(E element)
        To be used whenever populating the list initially from the database. Makes it possible to differentiate between previously persisted objects and new ones being added.

      • addAllFromDB

        boolean addAllFromDB(java.util.Collection<? extends E> c)
        Add a whole collection at a time.

      • getItemsAdded

        java.util.List<E> getItemsAdded()
        Which items have been added that need to be persisted.

        Which items have been removed that need to be persisted.

      • isDirty

        boolean isDirty()
        Have items been added or removed from this list?
